item.title: Research Publication in BMC Public Health
item.dc:creator: Swadhin Mondal
item.description:
Iâ€™m happy to share that my article has been published in BMC Public Health. This research contributes to our understanding of public health economics and policy implications.

This publication represents ongoing work in health economics and demonstrates the application of econometric methods to real-world health challenges.

item.title: Educational Journey at Vidyasagar University
item.dc:creator: Swadhin Mondal
item.description:
Celebrating an educational milestone - reflecting on my time completing my M.Sc at the Department of Economics, Vidyasagar University.

This foundational experience in Economics with specialization in Econometrics and Statistics laid the groundwork for my academic and professional journey in economic research and policy analysis.
